short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding NOTES to a space that is more relevant for use in VoteBuilder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension moves the NOTES panel displayed on a voter's info in a virtual phone bank to the top of the page making notes more noticeable going into a phone call.

(updated)  Now the extension also adds EVENTS after NOTES on the page
